lead_paragraph: JENNINGS--Richard Baker. The Trustees and staff of myFace, formerly the National Foundation for Facial Reconstruction, and the staff and patients of the Institute of Reconstructive Plastic Surgery at NYU Langone Medical Center mourn the passing of Richard B. Jennings who so generously provided his energy, passion and commitment to secure the success of the Institute and the patients it serves. Richard was a loyal and steadfast friend to everyone who knew him. His kindness and generosity were boundless. We extend our deepest sympathy to Richard's loving wife of 46 years, Nancy Steeger Jennings and his children. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JENNINGS, RICHARD BAKER
